err.cooldown:
You have already worked
Please try again in `{time}`

now.success: You got `{salary}` coins after working as `{work}`

err.not_found:
This is not valid work.
See a list of work by `{prefix}work list`
err.resign:
You are already doing a job, pls resign from it before taking a new job
(`{prefix} work resign`)

err.choose: You aren't working, pls choose a job (`{prefix}work as <work>`)

resign.success: Successfully resigned from the job of `{work}`

err.same: Hah, Nub! You can't share your money with yourself!
err.insufficient: You don't have enough money in your wallet to share
err.try_again: I just opened your account so please now try again

share.confirm: Are you sure to give `{amount}` coins to {user}?
